A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not a bad movie and the first hour is great but if you enjoyed any of the questions proposed in The Force Awakens then be ready to be disappointed. Rian Johnson sees these as nuances to his movie and treats them like so. It didn't ruin my childhood or anything that dramatic. It did ruin the new movies and new trilogy. I honestly have no desire to see anymore new star wars movies. I Will! I'm not going to lie to you or myself but not excited in the least. I watched the movie 3x and waited 3 months before I realized I was just constantly making excuses for the movie and had Phantom Mencace syndrome. Luke Skywalker himself has even stated Rian Johnson made this movie for himself and not the fans. It shows!
